definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise
stuck and not moving forward (idiom); stagnant/in a rut/at a standstill
to stagnate/to congeal/(fig.) to stop still/to freeze
silted up/obstructed by silt/variant of 瘀滯|瘀滞[yu1 zhi4]

sentences.english: We present a novel current-following SPWM inverter with delay-loop control.
sentences.chinese: 研究了一種滯環控制的電流跟蹤型SPWM逆變器。

sentences.english: Lake Aha, located in the suburb of Guiyang, Guizhou Province, is a medium artificial reservoir with seasonally anoxic hypolimina.
sentences.chinese: 貴州阿哈湖是一底層滯水帶季節性缺氧的中型人工湖。

sentences.english: The complete explanation of wetting hysteresis may pose quite a complex problem .
sentences.chinese: 要全面解釋潤溼滯合作用就會出現很複雜的問題。

sentences.english: The question of spear lag of beam plated construction is very complicated.
sentences.chinese: 梁板結構截面的剪力滯問題是一個比較複雜的問題。

sentences.english: Some statsisin intestine-liver circulation occurs in patients with liver-spleen incoordination.
sentences.chinese: 肝胃不和證存在膽汁排泌不良或腸肝循環瘀滯。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a hysteresis comparator whose output can be delayed when the input signal is in rising time.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了一種在輸入信號上升延遲滯的比較器電路。

definition: to flow out swiftly/to flood/a torrent/diarrhea/laxative
to decrease/to lose/to damage/to harm/(coll.) to speak sarcastically/to deride/caustic/mean/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (䷨)

to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out

to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter
